name: BipolarDisorder
title: Bipolar Disorder
description:
This value set is created for the NCQA's ECDS measures. It contains notes from the following HEDIS value sets:
1) Bipolar Disorder
2) Bipolar Disorder ECDS
3) Other Bipolar Disorder
